title: TPG Earnings Fall in First Quarterly Report Since IPO
sub_head: Private-equity firm’s net income came in at $41.2 million, compared with $45 million a year earlier
body:
TPG Inc. said its earnings fell in the fourth quarter, in the private-equity firm’s first financial report since going public in January.
TPG’s net income in the period came in at $41.2 million, or 52 cents a share, compared with $45 million, or 56 cents a share, a year earlier, as the appreciation in the value of its investments slowed.
